channel.title: Tops on Evan Goad
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Evan Goad

item.description: I am an experienced Software Engineer working in the web over the last 9 years. I have worked as a Full Stack Engineer with Procore, Liquid Planner, and ShareGrid as member of their agile teams. In the last 3 years, I began leading DevOps projects, and working as a Site Reliability Engineer. I am always looking for opportunities to make the web more reliable, understandable, and observable. Some of my side projects include this blog, and devenv, my automation tool for my development environment.
